Reviews.Title: PROBLEMS WITH FOSCAM F18905W
Reviews.Author: John R. Papa
Reviews.Content: Camera worked fine for a couple of months except that the focus is too narrow for the 40 or so feet i would like to use it at. The power supply failed after about 3 months but was promptly replaced by the seller. after I installed the new power supply I could not get it to work wirelessly any more. Overall I would not recommend this unit.

Reviews.Title: Good nite vision
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Wavershak
Reviews.Content: Not a bad camera...the wireless though is just unacceptable. I personally would prefer the wired part even if the wireless worked well. It's a little rough around the edges with flashing during the day. The camera is susceptable to any glare or bright light during the day. Some adjustments can be made but in one instance I had to reduce the res on one camera to 320 x ?. The other two run 640 x 480 but some contrast and brightness on one had to be toned down a litte. Plan on running the power supply close to the camera as any extension really reduces the 5VDC.

Reviews.Title: security camera
Reviews.Author: frank f
Reviews.Content: camera works great, except wireless does not work for me on my metal building, had to hard wire and that works great. Used 150 feet of ethernet cable both camera leaked in storm had to silicone lens as water got in, works ok not a very good picture, don't expect to read plate numbers. but is an ok camera for the price. My first camera was bad an had to sent back to Foscam and they replaced it in very good turn around time.

Reviews.Title: Excellent. Strong. Good Value
Reviews.Author: American Filigree
Reviews.Content: Excellent.  Good Value with Fast service.I have used clones and this far superior to them.The matte black finish gives it a rich look.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: The Foscam camera seems to work very well, especially after being helped by a polite and knowledgeable associate. We like the design because of its simpleness and good quality finish, it looks nice. We like the versatility of Wifi and the 300 horizontal degrees and 120 vertical degree viewing.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera
Reviews.Author: EmeryBaby
Reviews.Content: This product is great. It's very easy to use. And the resolution is fine. And the technician is very helpful. Awesome. I'm glad I can get to see from work what my baby's doing with the nanny at home. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Great Foscam Service
Reviews.Author: Dottie
Reviews.Content: Had some trouble connecting the wireless. Called Foscam customer service and Ralph had me up and running in no time.He was extremely helpful. Great service!

Reviews.Title: Great service and product
Reviews.Author: Bill H
Reviews.Content: Camara is great.  I bought 4 and had a little trouble with the set up since I am not too knowledgable.  A quick call to service tech support fixed everything ... they were wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: Mercboy
Reviews.Content: Calvin  Harris setup my camera perfectly and quickly! highly recommend.Set up the camera and I am very satisfied. I am highly recommend for cameras. I can recommend this camera for IR lights.

Reviews.Title: Foscam support
Reviews.Author: jupi zaraphet
Reviews.Content: Very Good support, very helpful. Calvin Harris was excellant to set up camera. I can recommend this camera office security.
